content.description: Have we gone too far? Could have just camped in the forest with all that chicken, but noooo, we had to chase some random vampire instead.

fields.name: Hyper
fields.value: +100% Speed, +90% Gold, +10% Luck | Unlocked by defeating the 25 minute boss

fields.name: Unlock
fields.value: Deal with the whole lunar eclipse event, starting from **Moongolow**

fields.name: Other
fields.value: This map contains a **Coffin** used to unlock **Zi'Assunta**

content.title: Cappella Magna
